Self.Wiki: Dynamic instanced assets, combined with a flat or billboard texture. Used to generate scattered grass or other such arrangements without the need for manual placement.

lod0ClusterType.Wiki: The LOD0 cluster type this grass asset belongs to.

lod1ClusterType.Wiki: The LOD1 cluster type this grass asset belongs to.

lod2ClusterType.Wiki: The LOD2 cluster type this grass asset belongs to.

baseDensity.Wiki: The base density value for the grass clumping.

modelName.Wiki: The grass model to define the parameters for.

flatTextureName.Wiki: The flat texture ID to use for this grass asset.

billboardTextureName.Wiki: The billboard texture ID to use for this grass asset.

normalInfluence.Wiki: The percentage of tilt that is applied to the grass asset based on its normal map.

inclinationMax.Wiki: The maximum percentage of tilt that can be applied to the grass. In degrees.

inclinationJitter.Wiki: The amount of jitter to apply to the tilt angle for this grass asset. In degrees.

scaleBaseMin.Wiki: The minimum width scale to apply to the grass asset.

scaleBaseMax.Wiki: The maximum width scale to apply to the grass asset.

scaleHeightMin.Wiki: The minimum height scale to apply to the grass asset.

scaleHeightMax.Wiki: The maximum height scale to apply to the grass asset.

colorShade1_r.Wiki: The red element of this color for multiplication color 1.

colorShade1_g.Wiki: The green element of this color for multiplication color 1.

colorShade1_b.Wiki: The blue element of this color for multiplication color 1.

colorShade2_r.Wiki: The red element of this color for multiplication color 2.

colorShade2_g.Wiki: The green element of this color for multiplication color 2.

colorShade2_b.Wiki: The blue element of this color for multiplication color 2.

flatSplitType.Wiki: The plane separation type to use for this grass asset's flat texture.

flatBladeCount.Wiki: The number of planes to use for this grass asset's flat texture.

flatSlant.Wiki: The angle of this grass asset's flat texture from the asset's position.

flatRadius.Wiki: The distance of this gtass asset's flat texture from the asset's position.

castShadow.Wiki: Whether this grass asset will cast a shadow.

windAmplitude.Wiki: The amplitude to apply to any wind force that affects this grass asset.

useDmyPolyDir.Wiki: Adjust the angle of the plane to the dummy polygon's direction.

windCycle.Wiki: The speed to apply to any wind force that affects this grass asset.

orientationAngle.Wiki: Determines the orientation direction for this grass asset. -1 for random orientation.

orientationRange.Wiki: Determines the range for the orientation direction parameter.

simpleModelName.Wiki: The model ID to use the simple representation of this grass asset.

lodRangeId.Wiki: The grass LOD range parameter to use for this grass asset.

sfxId.Wiki: The SFX ID to apply to this grass asset when generated.
